seed_pair.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
seed_pair.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

S0047: 因为我认为犯错是件好事。
Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
it's a good thing to make mistakes
S0048: I don't care about making mistakes.
S0049: 就是这样，如果你知道我的意思的话。
It's like this, if you know what I mean.
if you know what I mean
如果你知道我的意思的话
S0050: 我不是在试着尽快完成。
I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
to finish as quickly as possible
S0051: 我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
S0052: 他上周想给他的朋友写封信。
He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
S0053: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
put his letter in her bag
把他的信放进她的包里
S0054: 我们想多给你一点时间。
We wanted to give you a little more time.
give you a little more time
S0055: 当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
when I didn't sleep very well
S0056: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
So I can remember how to say a few words.

practice_phrases: I can't remember.
我记不住。
I can't remember a few words.
我记不住几个词。
I can't remember how to say it.
我记不住怎么说。
I can't remember interesting things.
我记不住有趣的事情。
I can't remember how to say a few words.
我记不住怎么说几个词。
I can't remember what I wanted to say.
我记不住我想说的话。
I can't remember how to say a few words when I wake up.
我醒来的时候记不住怎么说几个词。
I can't remember interesting things when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我记不住有趣的事情。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say to my friends.
我记不住怎么对朋友说我想说的话。
Because I think I can't remember, I don't enjoy doing interesting things.
因为我认为我记不住，我不喜欢做有趣的事情。

seed_context.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
seed_context.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

practice_phrases: What I wanted to say.
我想说的话。
I can't remember what I wanted to say.
我记不住我想说的话。
I know what I wanted to say.
我知道我想说的话。
What I wanted to say is interesting.
我想说的话很有趣。
I enjoy what I wanted to say to my friends.
我喜欢对朋友说我想说的话。
I don't know how to say what I wanted to say.
我不知道怎么说我想说的话。
Because I think what I wanted to say is a good thing.
因为我认为我想说的话是件好事。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say last week.
我记不住上周怎么说我想说的话。
I'm not trying to finish what I wanted to say as quickly as possible.
我不是在试着尽快说完我想说的话。
When I didn't sleep well, I can't remember what I wanted to say.
当我没睡好的时候，我记不住我想说的话。

seed_context.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
seed_context.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

lego: what to say / wanted to say
practice_phrases: What to say.
想说的话。
I know what to say.
我知道想说的话。
I don't know what to say.
我不知道想说的话。
What to say is very interesting.
想说的话很有趣。
I can't remember what to say to my friends.
我记不住对朋友想说的话。

这样我就能记住想说的话。

上周当我没睡好的时候，我不知道想说的话。

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
